Class Summary
Class Description
Categories
This is the class Categories, which helps us to creat Categor√≠e type objects.
CategoryLoading
This is the CategoryLoading class, which is used to fill linked lists with information of the materials.
Consultation
This is the Consultation class, here are the interface and the methods which allow us to fill labels and tables.
FrmLogIn
This class is used to display the screen that allows user access.
FrmMainMenu
This class is used to create a container for the windows.
MainMenu
This class is used to display the main menu window.
Material
This is the Material class, which helps us to define Material type objects.
MaterialLoading
This is the class MaterialLoading, which is used to read information from the .dat files.
MaterialRegistration
This is the class MaterialRegistration, which is used to write information in the .dat files.
NewData
This is the NewData class, which contains the methods for its window.
Shared
This is the Shared class, which is used to with data through the other classes.
TableLoading
This is the TableLoading class, which is used to fill the table that is shown in the window.
User
This is the class User, which is used to create User type objects.
UserData
This is the class UserData, which is used to validate users who can perform actions in the system.
UserValidation
This is the class UserValidation, which is used to validate the access who can access to the system.
